title: Hero: Flex
code:
<gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="s">
  <gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center">
    <gds-card variant="secondary" width="40px" height="40px" border-color="subtle-01">
      01
    </gds-card>
    <gds-card variant="secondary" width="40px" height="40px" border-color="subtle-01">
      02

    <gds-card variant="secondary" width="10px" height="40px" border-color="subtle-01">
      03
    </gds-card>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center" justify-content="flex-end">
    <gds-card variant="secondary" width="40px" height="40px" border-color="subtle-01">
      04
    </gds-card>
    <gds-card variant="secondary" width="10px" height="40px" border-color="subtle-01">
      05
    </gds-card>
  </gds-flex>
</gds-flex>
